name: Darn Tough Fish Eye Light Crew Socks - Unisex
description: See foot comfort in a new light. Fine-gauge knitting keeps these socks itch-free and lets your feet breathe. Seamless construction provides a smooth fit and ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters.Made of fine-gauge merino wool, nylon and spandex to keep your feet cool in the summer, warm in winter.Merino is naturally antimicrobial and prevents your feet from getting funky.True Seamless™ construction fuses seams for chafe-free wear.Darn Tough sources its wool from non-mulesed sheep.
